text:
Published 2024-01-04 08:49 by Hilbert Hagedoorn In the realm of graphics cards, AMD is expected to introduce the RX 7600 XT 16G desktop graphics card, as well as the RX 7700M and RX 7800M notebook GPUs. Furthermore, attendees can look forward to hearing additional updates regarding AMD's forthcoming CPUs and graphics cards.   Share this content
